returnValues.name: cancel
returnValues.description: Immediately stops any ongoing vibration by calling the API with a 0 duration.

returnValues.name: isSupported
returnValues.description: Indicates if the browser and device hardware support the Vibration API.

returnValues.name: vibrate
returnValues.description: Triggers vibration based on a number (ms) or an array (vibrate/pause ms). Returns true if successful.
